Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Establishes a retirement service credit for volunteer fire or emergency service
Summary: Establishes a retirement service credit for volunteer fire or emergency service.
LawCode: Add Art 20-A ยง1050, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to establishing a retirement service credit for volunteer fire or emergency service
